ApexTestRunResult.name: ApexTestRunResult
ApexTestRunResult.description: Contains summary information about all the test methods that were run in a particular Apex job.

AsyncApexJobId.description: The parent Apex job ID for the result.

ClassesCompleted.description: The total number of classes executed during the test run.

ClassesEnqueued.description: The total number of classes enqueued during the test run.

EndTime.description: The time at which the test run ended.

IsAllTests.description: Indicates whether all Apex test classes were run.

MethodsCompleted.description: The total number of methods completed during the test run. This value is updated after each class is run.

MethodsEnqueued.description: The total number of methods enqueued for the test run. This value is initialized before the test runs.

MethodsFailed.description: The total number of methods that failed during this test run. This value is updated after each class is run.

Source.description: The source of the test run, such as the Developer Console.

StartTime.description: The time at which the test run started.

Status.description: The status of the test run. Can be one of these values: Queued Preparing Processing Aborted Completed Failed

TestSetupTime.description: The time it took the setup methods to run, in milliseconds.

TestTime.description: The time it took the test to run, in milliseconds.

UserId.description: The user who ran the test run.
